name: Alone Time in The Void
description:
You are finally with your late lover again... But how long with this twisted paradise last?

After all,  it's just him and you now.

A spin off to 'The Darkness Calls'!

I recommend, though it's not necessary, that you play that game first, as this runs off one of the endings. Don't worry, the game is 100% free! (download here)

Music Used--

Headless Horseman by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com

Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)

--

Note: This Game is not completely polished, but due to time restraints I didn't quite have time to test everything.  Please leave a  comment if you found any graphical or grammatical errors! (Or any critique, really)
